info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 9:14AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Flathead County through 945 AM MDT... At 914 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 32 miles north of West Glacier, or 51 miles north of Evergreen, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Flathead County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
